timeline.title: Call for Papers Opens
timeline.description: Official opening of the call for papers for ICSID 2026
timeline.details: Authors are now invited to submit their research papers, case studies, and innovative solutions in fields, including, but not limited to, sustainability science, infrastructure, and innovation.

timeline.title: Abstract Submission Deadline
timeline.details: Please submit a 250-300 word abstract that describes your research objectives, methodology, and anticipated outcomes.

timeline.title: Abstract Review Results
timeline.details: Authors will receive notification of abstract acceptance and instructions for full paper submission.

timeline.title: Full Paper Submission Deadline
timeline.description: Deadline for submitting complete research papers
timeline.details: Submit your complete manuscript (6,000-8,000 words) following the IEEE formatting guidelines.

timeline.title: Paper Review Results
timeline.details: Authors will receive detailed review feedback and final acceptance decisions.

timeline.title: Camera Ready Submission
timeline.details: Submit your final camera-ready paper incorporating reviewer feedback and following all formatting requirements.

timeline.title: Early Bird Registration Opens
timeline.description: Opening of early bird registration period
timeline.details: Take advantage of discounted registration rates available until June 15, 2026.

timeline.title: Early Bird Registration Closes
timeline.description: End of early bird registration period
timeline.details: Regular registration rates apply after this date. Student and developing country discounts still available.

timeline.title: Regular Registration Closes
timeline.details: Last day to register for the conference. On-site registration will be available but at higher rates.

timeline.title: Hotel Booking Deadline
timeline.details: Book your accommodation at conference rates. Limited rooms available after this date.

timeline.title: Pre-Conference Workshops
timeline.details: Optional workshops covering emerging topics in sustainability and infrastructure innovation.

timeline.title: Conference Day 1
timeline.details: Opening ceremony, keynote speeches, and technical sessions begin.

timeline.title: Conference Day 3
timeline.details: Technical virtual sessions and closing ceremony.

notices.title: Registration System Update
notices.content: Our online registration system has been updated with improved security features and mobile responsiveness. All existing registrations remain valid.

notices.title: Paper Submission Extension
notices.content: Due to popular demand, we have extended the abstract submission deadline to January 31, 2026. Take advantage of this additional time to perfect your manuscript.

notices.title: Visa Information for International Attendees
notices.content: Ghana offers visa-free entry for many countries. Check our website for specific visa requirements and application procedures for your country.

notices.title: Student Travel Grants Available
notices.content: Limited travel grants are available for outstanding student papers. Applications are due by March 1, 2026. Contact the organizing committee for details.

notices.title: COVID-19 Safety Measures
notices.content: ICSID 2026 will follow all current health and safety guidelines. Vaccination requirements and testing protocols will be communicated closer to the event date.

notices.title: Accommodation Booking Reminder
notices.content: Early booking is recommended for conference hotels. Special rates are available until June 1, 2026. Visit our hotels page for booking information.
